EmailTemplate.description: Used for an automated email which is generated when the Status Owner is Changed.
EmailTemplate.name: Illumina Services Project : Status Owner Changed
EmailTemplate.subject: Status owner for {!Illumina_Services_Project__c.Name} has changed
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Hi {!Illumina_Services_Project__c.Status_Owner__c}, You are the new status owner for {!Illumina_Services_Project__c.Name} project. Current Project Status: {!Illumina_Services_Project__c.Project_Status__c} Thanks Concierge Team
